pages.text: The following block can have filters set:<li><l>(transport/input)Inputs</l><li><l>(transport/output)Outputs</l><li><l>(transport/pump)Pumps</l><li><l>(transport/drains)Drains</l>

<li>to set a filter right click with a bucket (or any other valid container) filled with a fluid<li>to remove a filter right click with an empty bucket in your hand<li>right click with a <l>(misc/configurator)Configurator</l> to set/remove filter using a GUI
